document_data.name: Salyndra Shaern
document_data.mainbody: Elder Reader '''Salyndra Shaern''' was a [[half-elf]] [[cleric]] of [[Oghma]] and of [[Corellon Larethian]] based at the [[House of Knowledge (Neverwinter)|House of Knowledge]] in [[Neverwinter]] in the late mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: The House of Knowledge was already being run by Chief Priest [[Watger Brighthair]] but, due to his youth, Salyndra was installed by the [[Church of Oghma]] to guide him. They continued to lead the temple together through the 1360s DR
document_data.Activities:
The two priests offered education for free, with teaching sessions doubling as services to Oghma the Binder.

As well as guiding Watger, Salyndra's role was also to promote good relations between [[human]]s and [[elves]] in Neverwinter and to study human wisdom for the elves. In all three areas, she did well.
document_data.Description: A petite old woman, Salyndra had hair that was gray, long, and untidy and spoke in a dry tone. She wore plain dark [[robe]]s.
document_data.Personality: Although Salyndra had a cynical attitude and her advice was sharply incisive, at her core she was genuinely kind and a fast and loyal friend to travelers in need. [[Adventurer]]s she'd aided often returned to the House of Knowledge to update her on their triumphs and to pay her back via donations to the temple.
